text: This article presents the discography of American country music artist, Jody Miller. While signed to Capitol Records and Epic Records, Miller released 13 studio albums between 1963 and 1977 and charted 27 singles on the Billboard Hot Country Singles chart. ==Albums== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2" style="width:22em;"| Title ! rowspan="2" style="width:14em;"| Details ! colspan="2"| Peak chart positions |- style="font-size:smaller;" ! width="50"| US Country ! width="50"| US |- ! scope="row"| Wednesday's Child Is Full of Woe | * Release date: 1963 * Label: Capitol Records | — | — |- ! scope="row"| Queen of the House | * Release date: 1965 * Label: Capitol Records | 17 | 124 |- ! scope="row"| Home of the Brave | * Release date: 1965 * Label: Capitol Records | — | — |- ! scope="row"| Jody Miller Sings the Great Hits of Buck Owens | * Release date: 1966 * Label: Capitol Records | — | — |- ! scope="row"| The Nashville Sound of Jody Miller | * Release date: * Label: Capitol Records | 42 | — |- ! scope="row"| Look at Mine | * Release date: 1970 * Label: Epic Records | 20 | — |- ! scope="row"| He's So Fine | * Release date: 1971 * Label: Epic Records | 12 | 117 |- ! scope="row"| There's a Party Goin' On | * Release date: 1972 * Label: Epic Records | 29 | — |- ! scope="row"| Good News | * Release date: 1973 * Label: Epic Records | 18 | — |- ! scope="row"| House of the Rising Sun | * Release date: 1974 * Label: Epic Records | 30 | — |- ! scope="row"| Country Girl | * Release date: 1975 * Label: Epic Records | 49 | — |- ! scope="row"| Will You Love Me Tomorrow | * Release date: 1976 * Label: Epic Records | — | — |- ! scope="row"| Here's Jody | * Release date: 1977 * Label: Epic Records | — | — |- | colspan="4" style="font-size:8pt"| "—" denotes releases that did not chart |} ===Compilations=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2" style="width:22em;"| Title ! rowspan="2" style="width:14em;"| Details !
